name: HAIRSTORY HAIR BALM
description: Smooth things over with moisture and set your blow-dryer free. Hair Balm revives parched strands, defines waves and curls, and air-dries all hair types into soft, shiny perfection. A little Hair Balm goes a long way—and so do its ripple effects. An extra touch of this lightweight formula between wash days instantly re-smooths frizz and restores texture.
